_note: IMPROVED: Position-Based Independent Selectors Implementation - This config follows CLAUDE.md principles using position-based independent selectors (DOM positions 105-241) to extract balance sheet data. Avoids complex string parsing by extracting fiscal periods (105-124), total assets (130-149), total liabilities (153-172), shareholders equity (176-195), current assets (199-218), and current liabilities (222-241) from specific DOM positions. All values are automatically converted from '仟元' (thousands) to actual values. Use with Taiwan stock codes like 2330.TW, 2454.TW, etc.
